title: Radical Hope: Letters of Love and Dissent in Dangerous Times
description: Radical Hope is a collection of lettersâ€”to ancestors, to children five generations from now, to strangers in grocery lines, to any and all who feel weary and discouraged--written by award-winning novelists, poets, political thinkers, and activists.
